general.gigTitle: design, redesign, and develop responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
I have an experience of 5 years in handling projects in wordpress, javascript, Jquery, PHP, html, CSS.
Some important points are:
- Always work according to the client requirements.
- Available to work 40 hours per week.
Looking forward to work with your dream projects.

description.content:
Hey, I'm Mayank, a professional WordPress website designer with 6+ years of experience in WordPress website design and development. If you are looking for a professional, clean, responsive, and easy-to-manage WordPress site, you have come to the right gig. I can create and design WordPress websites for Blogs, Portfolios, Businesses, E-Commerce, Real Estate, Healthcare, and medical.


What services do I offer in this gig?

1. Full WordPress Website design

2. Custom design

2. Bug Fixing

3. WordPress Installation and Setup

4. Website migration, cloning, and backups

5. Responsive design

6. Security integration


Why choose me?

- 100% Satisfaction

- Proper Communication

- Ongoing support


I pride myself on delivering high-quality work and excellent customer service. Please let me know in the inbox if you would like a customized price based on your specific needs.


If you choose to work with me, we'll schedule a Zoom call to ensure we're on the same page.


Please contact me before placing the order. We need to discuss first to avoid cancellation


Thanks & Regards,

Mayank

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I see your portfolio?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have designed and developed hundreds of websites for my clients with 100% satisfaction. You can ask for my portfolio by contacting me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do we can start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It is always best to leave me a message first so we can talk about the needs of your website. Everyone's project has different requirments and to avoid confusion, a brief conversation is highly recommended before your order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, I'd need your WordPress hosting login and Cpanel login credentials. Also, kindly provide your WordPress website link.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All websites that I create are responsive for all the Devices

questionsAndAnswers.question: What can I do if I don't have any content ready for my site at the moment?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will publish the site with dummy content, you can change it easily after your content is ready.  I will build the site using a drag and drop visual builder so it will be really easy for you to manage and do the update on your site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of support can I expect after the delivery of my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Defects and bugs caused by me are always repaired free of charge no matter how long after completion. For one week you are more than welcome to ask me any questions and I will find a solution for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: May I have your personal contact information (email/skype or others) so that we can have better communication?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, We cannot communicate outside the fiverr as thats against fiverr policies. All the communication and deal would be done via fiverr only.

packageList.title: One Page Website
packageList.description: Single page website (4-5 sections) with a slider, contact form, map, and social media integration.

packageList.title: Small to Medium Business
packageList.description: Responsive business website with a modern design (up to 5 pages).

packageList.title: Corporate Website / Shop
packageList.description: Premium business website / e-Commerce store with secure checkout (up to 8 pages)

reviews.comment:
He's an exceptionally talented man. Dedicated and very hard working, polite, and very knowledgeable.
I would be working with him on many more projects and would highly recommend him.
The website is exceptionally good.

seller_response.comment: Thanks a lot sir for your great feedback!

reviews.comment: working with mayank is always a pleasure. he understands your needs and does everything to give you a high level of satisfaction

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your great feedback.

reviews.comment: Great work. I highly recommend Mayank to anybody

Geweldige ervaring met Mayank Sharma!

Ik heb onlangs samengewerkt met Mayank Sharma en ik kan met zekerheid zeggen dat het een fantastische ervaring was. Mayank heeft niet alleen mijn ACF-template perfect op maat gemaakt, maar ook geoptimaliseerd voor mijn specifieke behoeften. Zijn oog voor detail en technische expertise hebben ervoor gezorgd dat alles vlekkeloos werkt. De communicatie was helder en hij leverde alles snel en naar volle tevredenheid op. Bedankt, Mayank, voor het geweldige werk!
Great job of protecting my websites

reviews_snippet.comment: I have been working with Mayank for several months and he is very patient with all my request.  I will continue to work with him now he knows and understands my business.
Again, great work! Mayank & team have done excellent work.  Very easy to communicate & an outstanding problem-solver...  Thank you for your hard work & commitment to outstanding excellence!

100% perfect!
In fact, better than my expectations. I'm really looking forward to producing more content for my new site!

Would recommend to everyone looking for a website for their business! Mayank is a pleasure to work with, understands requirements, communicates well, and is very accommodating. We got a professional website up and running in no time. Don't think twice!

He is extremly helpful. I asked him soo many queries, he resolved all of them patiently. He did very good quality work, I have developed a trust for him in all aspects, would love to work with him again.

notableClients.name: Rachael Tison
notableClients.interaction_description: The client required a website to showcase her media company. I created the website for her with dedicated sections & Pages to showcase the brand's intro., it's services, a highlight for the team and a page for free advise to provide value.

enriched_details.name: Raconteur Media
enriched_details.description: Raconteur Media Company is a digital marketing agency in Austin, Texas.

notableClients.name: Pierre Sokhn
notableClients.interaction_description: The client being from Lebanon wanted to do something good for his community while still living in Australia and support others from Lebanon. To support his moral cause I have made my small contribution and tried to help the people of Lebanon.

enriched_details.name: Lebanon Hub
enriched_details.description: Lebanon Hub is a platform that connects and inspires Lebanese throughout the world to bring about positive change in Lebanon.

notableClients.name: Carlos Todd
notableClients.interaction_description: The client needed an online platform to sell online courses to educate people on how to manage Anger conflicts, for which I created a complete suit of an Online LMS which includes tons of features like Courses, Lessons, Topic, Quizzes and much more..

enriched_details.name: Conflict Coaching & Consulting
enriched_details.description: Welcome To The Worlds Most Respected Anger Class.
